title: Implement user authentication mechanism
description: As a user, I want to securely log in using credentials and multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: Must include username and password login, and multi-factor authentication options.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using username and password, and is prompted for multi-factor authentication.
test_cases: Given a user with valid credentials, when they log in, then they are prompted for multi-factor authentication.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As a user, I want to access services relevant to my profile, so that I only see options I am authorized to use.
attributes_and_rules: Roles must be configurable and access restricted based on the user's profile.
acceptance_criteria: User can only access options and services assigned to their role.
test_cases: Given a user with the 'admin' role, when they log in, then they can access the admin dashboard.

title: Design responsive user interface
description: As a user, I want a consistent experience across all devices, so that I can use the portal on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
attributes_and_rules: UI must adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.
acceptance_criteria: UI adjusts appropriately and looks consistent on various devices.
test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on a tablet, when they navigate through the interface, then it adapts to the screen size and resolution.

title: Develop personalized dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access my banking products and services.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display relevant products and services based on user's profile.
acceptance_criteria: User sees a personalized dashboard with relevant products and services upon login.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific profile, when they log in, then their dashboard displays relevant products and services.

title: Implement integration layer with core banking system
description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure real-time synchronization between the self-service portal and core banking systems, so that data is consistent and up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must be secure and efficient, ensuring real-time data synchronization.
acceptance_criteria: Data is synchronized in real-time between the portal and core banking systems.
test_cases: Given a new service request is submitted on the portal, when checked in the core banking system, then the data is updated in real-time.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Design guided account opening workflows
description: As a customer, I want to open a new account through a step-by-step process, so that I can complete my application easily and accurately.
attributes_and_rules: Workflow must be intuitive, with data validation and compliance checks.
acceptance_criteria: Customer can open a new account following the guided workflow.
test_cases: Given a customer starts an account opening process, when they follow the steps, then their application is completed and submitted with data validation.

title: Develop real-time status update system
description: As a user, I want real-time updates on my service requests, so that I can track the progress at any stage.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications must include submission confirmations, approval statuses, and document requests.
acceptance_criteria: User receives real-time updates on the progress of their requests.
test_cases: Given a service request is submitted, when the status changes, then the user receives a real-time notification.

title: Maintain interaction logs for audit purposes
description: As an administrator, I want to access a comprehensive record of all customer interactions, so that audit and compliance requirements are met.
attributes_and_rules: Logs must be securely stored and accessible to authorized users.
acceptance_criteria: All interactions are logged and can be retrieved for auditing.
test_cases: Given an interaction occurs, when checked by an administrator, then the entire log is available for audit.

title: Implement data encryption protocols
description: As a security officer, I want to ensure that all sensitive data is encrypted, so that data breaches are prevented.
attributes_and_rules: Data must be encrypted at rest and in transit using industry-standard protocols.
acceptance_criteria: All sensitive data is encrypted at rest and in transit.
test_cases: Given sensitive data is transmitted, when it is intercepted, then it is encrypted and secure.

title: Introduce caching and load balancing
description: As a system architect, I want to implement caching and load balancing, so that portal performance is optimized and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Must handle concurrent usage efficiently and ensure high availability.
acceptance_criteria: System performance is optimized and remains reliable under load.
test_cases: Given concurrent usage on the portal, when a heavy load occurs, then performance remains optimized and the system is reliable.
